Mark Baker wrote:

>Ditto.
>  
>
Please see my recent post on the subject...  :-)

>MOVE and COPY are good exceptions though, because they work at a distance, i.e. the client never sees the representation. On the other hand, is MOVE really required when you can do COPY + DELETE?
>  
>
MOVE is atomic. There has been extended discussion of this on the WebDAV 
WG discussion list if you are interested in some of the other details.


Best,
Elias
